message.raw: fix imu_link issue by adding an imu_sensor, using the pose offset in imu_sensor to compute inertial values based on pelvis link pose/rates and the offset of the imu_sensor location.  removed hack to make imu_link's imu_joint non-fixed joint to avoid fixed joint reduction.
message.html: fix imu_link issue by adding an imu_sensor, using the pose offset in imu_sensor to compute inertial values based on pelvis link pose/rates and the offset of the imu_sensor location. removed hack to make imu_link's imu_joint non-fixed joint to avoid fixed joint reduction.

message: fix imu_link issue by adding an imu_sensor, using the pose offset in imu_sensor to compute inertial values based on pelvis link pose/rates and the offset of the imu_sensor location.  removed hack to make imu_link's imu_joint non-fixed joint to avoid fixed joint reduction.
